About StateSong Technology

StateSong is a patented technology that converts biological data into Endogenous music (from the inside). The idea? Capture the data from and transcode a musical rendition of a state, say calm or focused. Then, replay that music to guide you into that state. Using StateSong as a biofeedback tool, we can ‘entrain’ our minds and bodies towards deeper states of calm, focus, sleep, exercise, even happiness. (See StateSong, The Big Picture.pdf )

Apps, APIs & Cloud

StateSong will allow YOU to capture data from your biometric devices and transform it into music that represents YOUR states of emotion, mind, and body. StateSong APIs and Libraries let you to build Apps and UI/UXs. The Cloud Platform will empower you to create and share music that is 'endogenously' YOU.

Health, Sports & Music

  • PTSD suffer, Ron, listens to his CalmSong to reduce anxiety and stay calm.
  • Pat, a distance runner, recorded her 2ndWindSong to get her there sooner and stay in it longer.
  • Jen uses StateSong to make music for movie & TV scores with a plugin that imports biometric data.

Open Source Community

MediMuse™ is excited to offer OpenSource access for techies and creatives to envision and develop apps, UIs, plugins, processors, algorithms, and devices that leverage the power and flexibility of StateSong's Core Technology. If StateSong tech resonates with you, join the MediMuse Community here and we’ll contact you about getting started creating Endogenous Music!

About MediMuse LLC

MediMuse merges biometric data from your smart devices with audio tools, allowing you to create, listen, and share Music created from YOUR body.

MediMuse brings tgether biometric data from your smart devices with audio tools, allowing you to create, listen, and share ‘Endogenous Music’ created from YOUR body. MediMuse is delivering what may be the most profoundly impacting biofeedback system and audio tools developed to date. MediMuse's StateSong® technology converts YOUR body's data, while in different states and activities, into music (i.e. relaxed, aware, 2nd wind, walk, etc), then when listened to, ‘entrains’ YOUR body towards those states.

Click on the following activities and states to hear sample StateSongs:

Empatica Blog: Converting Human Data to Music Using the E4 "... StateSong, which in combination with the E4, records and converts biometric data from the wrist as music to help improve peoples' states over time." - Empatica , creator of the E4 , a R&D/Medical grade 5 biometric wrist device,

StateSong Downloads

LISTEN! You're Made of Music!!! StateSong apps lets you hear your 'states' as music. As you listen to YOUR StateSongs, you are synchronized with your best states. Download the Android app: StateSong Beta (Google Play); & StateSong User Guide .

StateSong SDK, APIs

Our SDK provides licensed access to a toolkit of libraries, apis, and plugins so you can leverage the power of the StateSong core technology.

StateSong OpenSource UI

MediMuse provides OpenSource access to StateSong technology so YOU can development UIs and apps for health & wellness, sports, and music production.
